text: gei Moses ga helekai gi Aaron, “Kaina dau baisin dugu ahi, wanga ina ono malala gaa mai di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, wanga ina ono ‘incense’ gi hongo nia malala aalaa. Kaina haga limalima gi nia daangada, heia taumaha haga madammaa. Haga limalima. Di hagawelewele Dimaadua la gu daamada, ge taumagi la gu daamada.”
